mapper.update: update base_menu set menuid=menuid ,code=#{code} ,title=#{title} ,parentid=#{parentid} ,href=#{href} ,ordernum=#{ordernum} ,description=#{description} ,enabled=#{enabled} where menuid=#{menuid}

update base_menu set menuid=menuid ,code=#{code} ,title=#{title} ,parentid=#{parentid} ,href=#{href} ,ordernum=#{ordernum} ,description=#{description} ,enabled=#{enabled} where 1=1 and menuid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and menuid =#{Where_Id} and menuid=#{Where_menuid} and code=#{Where_code} and title=#{Where_title} and parentid=#{Where_parentid} and href=#{Where_href} and ordernum=#{Where_ordernum} and description=#{Where_description} and enabled=#{Where_enabled}
mapper.select: select t.menuid "menuid", t.code "code", t.title "title", t.parentid "parentid", t.href "href", t.ordernum "ordernum", t.description "description", t.enabled "enabled" from base_menu t where menuid=#{menuid}

select t.menuid "menuid", t.code "code", t.title "title", t.parentid "parentid", t.href "href", t.ordernum "ordernum", t.description "description", t.enabled "enabled" from base_menu t where 1=1 and t.menuid=#{menuid} and t.code=#{code} and t.title=#{title} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.href=#{href} and t.ordernum=#{ordernum} and t.description=#{description} and t.enabled=#{enabled}

select t.menuid "menuid", t.code "code", t.title "title", t.parentid "parentid", t.href "href", t.ordernum "ordernum", t.description "description", t.enabled "enabled" from base_menu t where 1=1 and t.menuid=#{menuid} and t.code=#{code} and t.title=#{title} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.href=#{href} and t.ordernum=#{ordernum} and t.description=#{description} and t.enabled=#{enabled} order by t.ordernum
mapper.delete: delete from base_menu where 1=1 and menuid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and menuid =#{Where_Id} and menuid=#{Where_menuid} and code=#{Where_code} and title=#{Where_title} and parentid=#{Where_parentid} and href=#{Where_href} and ordernum=#{Where_ordernum} and description=#{Where_description} and enabled=#{Where_enabled}
mapper.select: select t.menuid "menuid", t.code "code", t.title "title", t.parentid "parentid", t.href "href", t.ordernum "ordernum", t.description "description", t.enabled "enabled" from base_menu t where 1=1 and t.menuid=#{menuid} and t.code=#{code} and t.title=#{title} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.href=#{href} and t.ordernum=#{ordernum} and t.description=#{description} and t.enabled=#{enabled}

select count(*) from base_menu t where 1=1 and t.menuid=#{menuid} and t.menuid!=#{NoId} and t.code=#{code} and t.title=#{title} and t.parentid=#{parentid} and t.href=#{href} and t.ordernum=#{ordernum} and t.description=#{description} and t.enabled=#{enabled}

select distinct t.* from base_resource_authority ra inner join base_menu t on ra.resourceid = t.menuid and ra.ugroupid in ( select ugroupid from base_ugroup_member where userid = #{userid} ) and ra.authoritytype = 'ugroup' and ra.resourcetype = 'menu' order by t.ordernum
